segments.text: Oh man, I can't believe what's happening in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that stool, stretching so high towards the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks so unstable, ready to collapse under him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, he could really hurt himself on the counter or floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's right there, waiting for her share, but she might get knocked over too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the sinkâ€”water everywhere, flooding the place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just drying dishes, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron and dress will be soaked if she steps back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry the whole floor will be slippery soon, causing slips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks peaceful, but inside it's a disaster waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to yell or stop this before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting wet, might ruin everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in tears for sure.
segments.speaker: PAR
